name: babel-plugin-create-object-id
description: Creates a sequential id inside objects with render method (components) for later use in CSS scoping

scripts.git-i2: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m 'Initial commit'
scripts.git-initial: npm run git-i1 && npm run git-i2 && npm run git-i3
scripts.deploy: npm run git-initial && npm run build && npm run pack
